LanguageData.AdvancedFabrication.label: advanced fabrication
LanguageData.AdvancedFabrication.description: Fabricate advanced components from standard components and other materials.
LanguageData.Bionics.label: bionic replacements
LanguageData.Bionics.description: Build high-tech bionic body parts to replace lost limbs and eyes. Requires a skilled doctor to attach.
LanguageData.ChargedShot.label: pulse-charged munitions
LanguageData.ChargedShot.description: Build weapons which fire pulse-charged munitions for extra damage. Note that these also require advanced components.
LanguageData.Cryptosleep.label: cryptosleep casket
LanguageData.Cryptosleep.description: Construct cryptosleep caskets, which can put living beings in a state of indefinite suspended animation.
LanguageData.Fabrication.label: fabrication
LanguageData.Fabrication.description: Build fabrication benches, capable of high-tech projects ranging from component assembly to power armor construction.
LanguageData.Fabrication.discoveredLetterText:
You now have the technology to build a fabrication bench - but it also requires some advanced components to get started. You can collect advanced components several ways:

 -All outlander settlements sell advanced components. Send a caravan to buy some.
 -Some visiting traders sell advanced components. Invite or wait for them.
 -Some quests are rewarded with advanced components.
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.label: multi-analyzer
LanguageData.MultiAnalyzer.description: Build multi-analyzers which increase research speed and allow higher-level research projects.
LanguageData.PoweredArmor.label: marine armor
LanguageData.PoweredArmor.description: Build marine armor, a general-use powered armor suit used by high-tech shock troops. Note that these also require advanced components.
LanguageData.ReconArmor.label: recon armor
LanguageData.ReconArmor.description: Craft recon armor, a light powered armor suit used by scout troops who need protection on the move. Note that these also require advanced components.
LanguageData.RocketswarmLauncher.label: rocketswarm launcher
LanguageData.RocketswarmLauncher.description: Produce rocketswarm launchers, single-burst turrets which can devastate a wide area at a key moment in battle.
LanguageData.SniperTurret.label: uranium slug turret
LanguageData.SniperTurret.description: Produce the armor-penetrating uranium slug turret. It fires uranium slugs which tear through plasteel like paper, but it's less effective at close range.
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.label: vitals monitor
LanguageData.VitalsMonitor.description: Build vitals monitors which improve medical outcomes when placed next to hospital beds.
